DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Pharmaton Tablets Mental Performance Physical Fatigue Nurses Working Night Shift
DOC.criteria: Male female nurse nurse auxiliary work night shift Age range : 20 45 inclusive BMI range : 1830 Negative pregnancy test females Subjects must free clinically significant disease condition require physician 's care and/or interfere study evaluation procedure Clinical laboratory test within normal limit , normal range , clinically acceptable investigator Negative urine drug screen drug screen Subjects must willing give informed consent prior study enrolment able adhere restriction examination schedule Any serious disorder may interfere his/her participation trial evaluation safety test drug ( e.g . liver and/or renal disease , hypervitaminosis A , psychic disorder , etc . ) and/or treatment chronic medication Pretreatment ( less 2 week prior inclusion trial ) and/or concomitant treatment drug may influence trial symptomatology may interfere evaluation safety test drug ( e.g . vitamin mineral supplementation ) Individuals drink 40 g alcohol/day ( glass 12.5 cl wine 10° = 12 g ; glass 4 cl aperitif 42° = 17 g ; glass 25 cl beer 3° = 7.5 g ; glass 25 cl beer 6° = 15 g ) ; Alcohol drug abuse accord Diagnostic Statistic Manual , Version IV ( DSMIV ) Individuals drink 6 cup coffee tea/day Individuals smoke 10 cigarettes/day Female volunteer childbearing age use adequate mean birth control ( contraceptive pill , Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) , sterilization ) Pregnancy and/or lactation Relevant allergy know hypersensitivity investigational product excipients Individuals take take recently vitamins mineral supplementation Individuals current disorder likely modify EEG recording and/or computerize cognitive testing Individuals history cancer Participation another clinical trial within last 3 month prior start study concurrent participation another clinical trial Individuals without health insurance
